subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for gauge UI components.

subMembers.name: animation
subMembers.description: Specifies animation properties.

subMembers.name: duration
subMembers.description: Determines how long animation runs.

subMembers.name: easing
subMembers.description: Specifies the animation easing mode.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not animation is enabled.

subMembers.name: containerBackgroundColor
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of the parent page element.

subMembers.name: loadingIndicator
subMembers.description: Configures the loading indicator.

subMembers.name: backgroundColor
subMembers.description: Specifies a range container's background color.

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: Specifies the offset of the range container from an invisible scale line in pixels.

subMembers.name: palette
subMembers.description: Specifies the palette to be used for colorizing ranges in the range container.

subMembers.name: paletteExtensionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies what to do with colors in the [palette] when their number is less than the number of ranges in the range container.

subMembers.name: rangeContainer
subMembers.description: Specifies properties of the gauge's range container.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of a range.

subMembers.name: endValue
subMembers.description: Specifies an end value of a range.

subMembers.name: ranges
subMembers.description: An array of objects representing ranges contained in the range container.

subMembers.name: startValue
subMembers.description: Specifies a start value of a range.

subMembers.name: allowDecimals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to allow decimal values on the scale. When **false**, the scale contains integer values only.

subMembers.name: customMinorTicks
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of custom minor ticks.

subMembers.name: customTicks
subMembers.description: Specifies an array of custom major ticks.

subMembers.name: endValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the end value for the scale of the gauge.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in scale labels.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for the text displayed in the scale labels of the gauge.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a scale label. Accepts only numeric formats.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies common properties for scale labels.

subMembers.name: overlappingBehavior
subMembers.description: Decides how to arrange scale labels when there is not enough space to keep all of them.

subMembers.name: useRangeColors
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not scale labels should be colored similarly to their corresponding ranges in the [range container].

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not scale labels are visible on the gauge.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of the scale's minor ticks.

subMembers.name: length
subMembers.description: Specifies the length of the scale's minor ticks.

subMembers.name: minorTick
subMembers.description: Specifies properties of the gauge's minor ticks.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of the scale's minor ticks.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether scale minor ticks are visible or not.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the scale's minor ticks.

subMembers.name: minorTickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between minor ticks.

subMembers.name: scale
subMembers.description: Specifies properties of the gauge's scale.

subMembers.name: scaleDivisionFactor
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum distance between two neighboring [major ticks] in pixels.

subMembers.name: startValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the start value for the scale of the gauge.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of the scale's major ticks.

subMembers.name: length
subMembers.description: Specifies the length of the scale's major ticks.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of the scale's major ticks.

subMembers.name: tick
subMembers.description: Specifies properties of the gauge's major ticks.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether scale major ticks are visible or not.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the scale's major ticks.

subMembers.name: tickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between major ticks.

subMembers.name: subvalues
subMembers.description: Specifies a set of subvalues to be designated by the subvalue indicators.

subMembers.name: contentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for a tooltip.

subMembers.name: customizeTooltip
subMembers.description: Allows you to change the appearance of specified tooltips.

subMembers.name: interactive
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: tooltip
subMembers.description: Configures tooltips.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies the main value on a gauge.

subMembers.name: CommonIndicator
subMembers.description: A base object for gauge value and subvalue indicators. Includes the properties of indicators of all types.

subMembers.name: arrowLength
subMembers.description: Specifies the length of an arrow for the indicator of the *textCloud* type in pixels.

subMembers.name: backgroundColor
subMembers.description: Specifies the background color for the indicator of the *rangeBar* type.

subMembers.name: baseValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the base value for the indicator of the *rangeBar* type.

subMembers.name: beginAdaptingAtRadius
subMembers.description: Specifies a radius small enough for the indicator to begin adapting.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of the indicator.

subMembers.name: horizontalOrientation
subMembers.description: Specifies the orientation of the *rangeBar* indicator. Applies only if the **geometry**.[orientation] property is *"vertical"*.

subMembers.name: indentFromCenter
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between the needle and the center of a gauge for the indicator of a needle-like type.

subMembers.name: length
subMembers.description: Specifies the indicator length.

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between the indicator and the invisible scale line.

subMembers.name: palette
subMembers.description: Sets the palette to be used to colorize indicators differently.

subMembers.name: secondColor
subMembers.description: Specifies the second color for the indicator of the *twoColorNeedle* type.

subMembers.name: secondFraction
subMembers.description: Specifies the length of a *twoNeedleColor* type indicator tip as a percentage.

subMembers.name: size
subMembers.description: Specifies the range bar size for an indicator of the *rangeBar* type.

subMembers.name: spindleGapSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the inner diameter in pixels, so that the spindle has the shape of a ring.

subMembers.name: spindleSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the spindle's diameter in pixels for the indicator of a needle-like type.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in an indicator.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for the text displayed by the indicator.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an indicator. Accepts only numeric formats.

subMembers.name: indent
subMembers.description: Specifies the range bar's label indent in pixels.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the appearance of the text displayed in an indicator of the *rangeBar* type.

subMembers.name: verticalOrientation
subMembers.description: Specifies the orientation of the *rangeBar* indicator. Applies only if the **geometry**.[orientation] property is *"horizontal"*.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of an indicator in pixels.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the type of gauge indicators.

subMembers.name: Indicator Types
subMembers.description: This section lists objects that define properties used to configure value and subvalue indicators of specific types.

Events.name: onTooltipHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip becomes hidden.

Events.name: onTooltipShown
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

Events.name: tooltipHidden
Events.description: Raised when a tooltip becomes hidden.
